issue.title: [Rust] [Datafusion] nested binary expressions broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9696](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9696). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Nested binary expressions were previously supported and broken by the sqlparser upgrade.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9696?focusedCommentId=17175942) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7935
